title: Plastics and fibreglass: thermoplastics
creator_credit: Helmut Engelhardt, Joe Hayward and Moreland-Latchford Productions
brief_description: Demonstrates the use of the strip heater for bending acrylic sheet. The actions cover various machine tools for cutting plastic sheet, the making of jigs, cutting, planing, filing, buffing and polishing operations. Cementing pieces together. Techniques are then applied to making a project.
creator_credit_for_label: Helmut Engelhardt, Joe Hayward and Moreland-Latchford Productions
